tool_description: With this API you can retrieve the details of the movies that you searched
title: List of movies

api_list.name: Search movies by their title
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://list-of-movies1.p.rapidapi.com/movies/{primarytitle}/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "list-of-movies1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
